title: is it possible to view the password on saved connections? Thanks
author: andrub72
body_snippet:
is it possible to view the password on saved connections?
Thanks

comments.snippet: yes and now :) technically you could add external tool with a script who show you a password, but that will stop working once we implement a security patch. I am still thinking if allow users to decrypt passwords (many admins asking to dont!) but perhaps what will be possible under admin options only (in next release it will be normal user and elevated one, by default normal user will have all same permissions (for home users) but corporate admins will be able to restrict such.

My 2 cents
comments.author: Cool34000

comments.snippet:
You can also use PowerShell to view passwords (better complex passwords management!)
Create your external tool that launches the script:
```
Name : View infos
File : powershell.exe
Args : -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File "C:\Program Files (x86)\mRemoteNG\ShowInfos.ps1" -Description "%!description%" -Name "%!name%" -User "%!username%" -Pass "%!password%"
```
